title: Advanced Configuration
description: Configuration for the design system including theme colors, typography, spacing, etc. This drives generation of CSS variables and styling.

seeds.title: Quick Seeds
seeds.description: Minimal theme seeds â€” preferred for quick edits; detailed overrides remain available below.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Base theme colors and semantic color overrides.

primary.title: Primary
primary.description: Primary brand color (hex code). Used as the main accent and to derive related colors.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: Secondary or neutral color (hex code). Used for secondary accents, grayscales, etc.

accent.title: Accent
accent.description: Accent color (hex code) for highlights or contrast (e.g., a vibrant color like pink or red).

background.title: Background
background.description: Base background color for light mode (hex code). Used as the default page background.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Overrides
darkMode.description: Custom color overrides for dark mode. If not provided, dark mode colors are auto-generated from light mode values.

background.title: Background
background.description: Background color for dark mode (hex code). Overrides the light mode background with a darker color.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: Secondary color for dark mode (hex code), e.g. for dark mode borders or inputs. Provides a neutral gray in dark theme.

success.title: Success
success.description: Semantic success color (hex code). If null, a green-toned color will be derived automatically from the primary color.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Semantic warning color (hex code). If null, defaults to the accent color.

danger.title: Danger
danger.description: Semantic danger/error color (hex code). If null, a red-toned color will be derived from the primary color.

info.title: Info
info.description: Semantic info color (hex code). If null, defaults to the primary color.

gradientStops.title: Gradient Stops
gradientStops.description: Number of color stops to generate in gradients. Controls how many shades are produced for color gradients.

elevationOpacity.title: Elevation Opacity
elevationOpacity.description: Opacity for elevated surfaces/shadows (0 to 1). A low number gives subtle shadows for elevation.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Font families, sizes, and text spacing settings.

fontFamilyHeadings.title: Headings Font Family
fontFamilyHeadings.description: Font family stack for headings (e.g., page titles). Use a CSS font-family string.

fontFamilyBody.title: Body Font Family
fontFamilyBody.description: Font family stack for body text. Use a CSS font-family string.

fontFamilyMono.title: Monospace Font Family
fontFamilyMono.description: Font family for monospaced text (e.g., code blocks). Use a CSS font-family string.
fontFamilyMono.default: ui-monospace, "Cascadia Code", "Source Code Pro", Menlo, Consolas, monospace

baseFontSize.title: Base Font Size
baseFontSize.description: Base font size in pixels. This is the root text size for the design (e.g., 16px).

fontWeightLight.title: Font Weight (Light)
fontWeightLight.description: Label for light font weight. Choose from preset weight options (light, normal, medium, semibold, bold).

fontWeightNormal.title: Font Weight (Normal)
fontWeightNormal.description: Label for normal font weight. Choose from preset weight options (light, normal, medium, semibold, bold).

fontWeightMedium.title: Font Weight (Medium)
fontWeightMedium.description: Label for medium font weight. Choose from preset weight options (light, normal, medium, semibold, bold).

fontWeightSemibold.title: Font Weight (Semibold)
fontWeightSemibold.description: Label for semibold font weight. Choose from preset weight options (light, normal, medium, semibold, bold).

fontWeightBold.title: Font Weight (Bold)
fontWeightBold.description: Label for bold font weight. Choose from preset weight options (light, normal, medium, semibold, bold).

lineHeightTight.title: Line Height (Tight)
lineHeightTight.description: Label for tight line height. Options: tight, normal, relaxed.

lineHeightNormal.title: Line Height (Normal)
lineHeightNormal.description: Label for normal line height. Options: tight, normal, relaxed.

lineHeightRelaxed.title: Line Height (Relaxed)
lineHeightRelaxed.description: Label for relaxed line height. Options: tight, normal, relaxed.

letterSpacingTight.title: Letter Spacing (Tight)
letterSpacingTight.description: Tight letter-spacing (tracking) for text. A negative value reduces spacing (e.g., -0.025 for -2.5%).

letterSpacingNormal.title: Letter Spacing (Normal)
letterSpacingNormal.description: Normal letter-spacing (tracking) for text. 0 means no extra spacing.

letterSpacingWide.title: Letter Spacing (Wide)
letterSpacingWide.description: Wide letter-spacing (tracking) for text. A positive value increases spacing (e.g., 0.025 for +2.5%).

spatialRhythm.title: Spatial Rhythm
spatialRhythm.description: Spacing system settings for consistent layout rhythm.

baseUnit.title: Base Spacing Unit
baseUnit.description: Base spatial unit in pixels for spacing (e.g., margin/padding).

scaleRatio.title: Scale Ratio
scaleRatio.description: Scale factor for spacing increments. Each subsequent spacing size is this multiple of the previous one.

maxSpacingSteps.title: Max Spacing Steps
maxSpacingSteps.description: Maximum number of spacing increments to generate (defines the largest spacing scale).

containerMaxWidth.title: Container Max Width
containerMaxWidth.description: Maximum content container width in pixels. Defines the max width for layout containers.

containerPadding.title: Container Padding (units)
containerPadding.description: Padding inside containers, as a multiple of the base unit.

inputPadding.title: Input Padding (units)
inputPadding.description: Padding inside input fields, as a multiple of the base unit.

buttonPadding.title: Button Padding (units)
buttonPadding.description: Padding inside buttons, as a multiple of the base unit.

sectionSpacing.title: Section Spacing (units)
sectionSpacing.description: Spacing between sections/components, in multiples of the base unit.

layers.title: Layers & Elevation
layers.description: Shadow depth, blur effects, and z-index layering.

shadowDepth.title: Shadow Depth
shadowDepth.description: Default shadow depth level for components. Options: none, light, medium, deep, extreme.

blurLight.title: Light Blur Radius
blurLight.description: Blur radius for light blur effects (px). Used for subtle background blurring or small shadow blur.

blurMedium.title: Medium Blur Radius
blurMedium.description: Blur radius for medium blur effects (px).

blurHeavy.title: Heavy Blur Radius
blurHeavy.description: Blur radius for heavy blur effects (px).

zIndexDropdown.title: z-index Dropdown
zIndexDropdown.description: z-index for dropdown menus and similar overlays.

shape.title: Shape & Corners
shape.description: Border radius and related shape settings.

radiusSize.title: Base Border Radius
radiusSize.description: Base border radius size for components. Options: none (0px), small (4px), medium (8px), large (16px), full (9999px for pill shape).

borderWidth.title: Base Border Width
borderWidth.description: Base border width for components. Options: hairline (0.5px), thin (1px), medium (2px), thick (3px).

customRadius.title: Custom Border Radius
customRadius.description: Custom border radius value (CSS length, e.g., '10px' or '50%'). Overrides radiusSize if set. Null means use standard radius.

behavior.title: Behavior & Animations
behavior.description: Global behavior settings like transitions and hover effects.

transitionSpeed.title: Transition Speed
transitionSpeed.description: Standard transition animation speed. Options: fast (~150ms), normal (~250ms), slow (~350ms).

animationEasing.title: Animation Easing
animationEasing.description: Default easing function for animations. Options: linear, ease, ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out, bounce.

customTransitionSpeed.title: Custom Transition Speed
customTransitionSpeed.description: Custom transition duration in milliseconds. If provided, overrides the preset transitionSpeed.

customEasing.title: Custom Easing Function
customEasing.description: Custom CSS easing function (e.g., a cubic-bezier string). Overrides the preset animationEasing if set.

focusRingWidth.title: Focus Ring Width
focusRingWidth.description: Width of the focus outline/ring in pixels.

focusRingOpacity.title: Focus Ring Opacity
focusRingOpacity.description: Opacity of the focus ring (0 to 1). Controls transparency of the focus highlight.

hoverOpacity.title: Hover Opacity
hoverOpacity.description: Opacity of hover state overlay (0 to 1). A semi-transparent overlay applied on hover.

layout.title: Layout & Grid
layout.description: Grid system and layout density settings.

gridColumns.title: Grid Columns
gridColumns.description: Number of columns in the grid system.

gridGutter.title: Grid Gutter Width
gridGutter.description: Gutter width between grid columns, as a multiple of the base unit.

breakpoints.title: Breakpoints
breakpoints.description: Responsive breakpoints (min-width in pixels for various screen sizes).

sm.title: Small (sm) Breakpoint
sm.description: Minimum width (px) for small screens (e.g., mobile).

md.title: Medium (md) Breakpoint
md.description: Minimum width (px) for medium screens (e.g., tablets).

lg.title: Large (lg) Breakpoint
lg.description: Minimum width (px) for large screens (e.g., laptops).

xl.title: Extra Large (xl) Breakpoint
xl.description: Minimum width (px) for extra-large screens (e.g., desktops).

densityCompact.title: Density - Compact
densityCompact.description: UI density scale factor for compact mode. A multiplier less than 1 for tighter spacing (e.g., 0.8).

densityNormal.title: Density - Normal
densityNormal.description: UI density scale factor for normal mode (default 1.0).

densityComfortable.title: Density - Comfortable
densityComfortable.description: UI density scale factor for comfortable mode. A multiplier greater than 1 for more spacing (e.g., 1.2).

buttonMinHeight.title: Button Min Height
buttonMinHeight.description: Minimum height for buttons in pixels. Ensures touch targets meet accessibility guidelines (e.g., 44px).

inputMinHeight.title: Input Min Height
inputMinHeight.description: Minimum height for input fields in pixels.

linkStyle.title: Link Style
linkStyle.description: Default display style for hyperlinks. Options: inline (standard inline text link), block (block-level link), button (styled like a button).

colorDerivation.title: Color Derivation Method
colorDerivation.description: Method for deriving color variations (success/warning/etc) from base colors. e.g., 'hsl' uses HSL color shifts.

minTouchTarget.title: Min Touch Target
minTouchTarget.description: Minimum touch target size in pixels. Ensures interactive elements are at least this size (44px is standard).

prefersReducedMotion.title: Prefers Reduced Motion
prefersReducedMotion.description: Whether to respect users' reduced motion preference. If true, reduces or disables non-essential animations.

focusStyle.title: Focus Style
focusStyle.description: Style for focus outlines. Options: ring (default outline ring), outline (browser default outline), border (change border style), glow (subtle glow).

components.title: Component Toggles
components.description: Enable or disable built-in component styling.

toasts.title: Toasts
toasts.description: Include styling for toast notification components.

modals.title: Modals
modals.description: Include styling for modal dialog components.

forms.title: Forms
forms.description: Include styling for form elements (inputs, buttons, etc.).

tabStrip.title: Tab Strip
tabStrip.description: Include styling for tab strip (tabs) components.

drawer.title: Drawer
drawer.description: Include styling for drawer (off-canvas panel) components.

set.title: Icon Set
set.description: Icon set or library to use (e.g., 'phosphor'). Ensure the icon set is available in the project.

weight.title: Icon Weight
weight.description: Default icon weight/style (if applicable for the icon set). For Phosphor icons: thin, light, regular, bold, fill, duotone.

sizes.title: Icon Sizes
sizes.description: Named icon sizes (in pixels) for various contexts.

xs.title: Extra Small Icon (xs)
xs.description: Pixel size for extra small icons.

xl.title: Extra Large Icon (xl)
xl.description: Pixel size for extra large icons.

2xl.title: 2x Large Icon (2xl)
2xl.description: Pixel size for double extra large icons.

spritePath.title: Sprite Path
spritePath.description: File path or URL to the icon sprite (if using an SVG sprite sheet).

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug mode. If true, the design system will log verbose debug information to the console.
